entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING ENDED, Val-d'Or

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 14.
